trans-unit.source: Declares a binding that defines one or more XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: 宣告會定義一或多個 XML Web 服務方法的繫結。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface, in that it defines a concrete set of operations.
trans-unit.target: 繫結所定義的 「 Web 服務描述語言 」 (WSDL) 是類似於介面，它會定義一組具象的作業。

trans-unit.source: Each XML Web service method is an operation within a particular binding.
trans-unit.target: 每個 XML Web service 方法是在特定繫結中的作業。

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a WebServiceBindingAttribute applied to a class implementing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法都是 XML Web service 的預設繫結或繫結套用至類別實作 XML Web service WebServiceBindingAttribute 內指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, by applying multiple WebServiceBindingAttribute attributes to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務可以實作多個繫結，將多個 WebServiceBindingAttribute 屬性套用至 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Once one or more <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute> attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 一次一個或多個<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute>屬性會套用至 XML Web service，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>可以套用至個別的 XML Web 服務方法，以指出特定的 XML Web 服務方法所實作之繫結作業。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Binding%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Binding%2A><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>指定之繫結 XML Web 服務方法會實作作業 for...in</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>屬性</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref> class setting the name of the binding the XML Web service method is implementing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref>類別設定繫結會實作 XML Web service 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to and is a member of the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式用來指定 XML Web 服務，它會套用至成員而的預設命名空間中定義的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法會實作作業的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式用來指定 XML Web 服務，它會套用到的而且提供的命名空間的成員中所定義的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法會實作作業的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The namespace associated with the binding.
trans-unit.target: 搭配此繫結關聯的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding not defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式用來指定 XML Web 服務，它會套用到的而且提供的命名空間的成員中未定義的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法會實作作業的繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The namespace associated with the binding.
trans-unit.target: 搭配此繫結關聯的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace*>

trans-unit.source: The location where the binding is defined.
trans-unit.target: 繫結定義所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which the binding claims to conform.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定宣告以符合繫結的 Web 服務互通性 (WSI) 規格。

trans-unit.source: The WS-I organization publishes guidelines to ensure the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
trans-unit.target: WS-我的組織發行指導方針，以確保跨平台的 Web 服務的互通性。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the WSI specification to which the binding claims to conform.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出 WSI 規格的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.EmitConformanceClaims%2A> property controls whether the conformance claims are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.EmitConformanceClaims%2A>屬性會控制已發行的 Web 服務的 WSDL 描述時，是否提供相容主張。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.EmitConformanceClaims%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> values, indicating a WSI specification.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref>值，表示 WSI 規格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the binding emits conformance claims.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出繫結是否發出相容主張。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property controls whether the conformance claims expressed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.ConformsTo%2A> property are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值控制是否相容主張來表示<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.ConformsTo%2A>發佈 Web 服務的 WSDL 描述時，會提供屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute.ConformsTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the binding emits conformance claims; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果繫結發出相容主張。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where the binding is defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結定義所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location where the binding is defined.
trans-unit.target: 繫結定義所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is the URL of the XML Web service to which the attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 預設為套用屬性之 XML Web 服務的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.
trans-unit.target: 預設為"Soap"附加的 XML Web 服務的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace associated with the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結相關聯的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The default is http://tempuri.org/.
trans-unit.target: 預設值則為 http://tempuri.org/。
